page.title: 14Cycling Proficiency
page.content: To practise road safety Mr Finch took us to Long Melford on our bikes. At the huge church was a replica of the{Bayeux Tapestry}50m long, the first time it has been seen in England The frieze shows King Edward sending Harold to nominate Duke William as his successor, and Harold's adventures. The king's funeral scene is in the wrong order! Why did Harold break his oath and take the crown? I liked the {invasion}scenes and the banquet and the battle. Bishop Odo ought not to fight but he has a big club. The last two scenes are a Norman cavalry charge and the English{retreat. } They say the last scene was Harold's coronation and it has been lost. Mrs Finch says it's really{embroidery,}not tapestry, but it's a fantastic piece of work. I wish poor Harold had been able to put his point of view.
